body.p:
His Excellency
Thos E. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky
Sir

There is now an Indictment pending in the circuit Court for Montgomery County against Garrett Ballard a former resident of said County for the Murder of James P. Poynter, who was a resident of said County, and who was killed in Sept. 1864. Said Garrett Ballard is now a fugitive from Justice as a Bench warrant has issued and been returned as to him "Not found"
It is therefore asked that you offer a reward for his apprehension and arrest.

Yrs: very Respectf
R. Apperson Jr.
About 34 years of age, about five feet, eleven inches high, of heavy build, black hair, florid complexion, and rough in manner and in language.

$300 Reward
Montgomery Co for Garrett Ballard
offered 28 July 1865
